scripts.preview:local: rimraf out && next build && serve -s out -l 3000
scripts.preview:auto: rimraf out && next build && serve -s out -l 3000 & npx wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npx open-cli http://localhost:3000
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to GitHub Pages" && git push origin main
scripts.preview:all: npm run preview:auto && echo 'Preview complete. To deploy, run: npm run deploy'
